mapper.select: select a.id, a.icon, title, if(title is not null, name, title) as name, if(title is not null, title, name) as label, parent_id ,hidden, path, create_time, order_num, type, affix, component from ( select menu.id as id, meta.icon as icon, menu.name as name, meta.title as title,menu.parent_id as parent_id, menu.hidden as hidden, menu.create_time, menu.path, menu.order_num, menu.type, meta.affix, menu.component from tb_sys_menu menu left join tb_sys_menu_meta meta on menu.id = meta.menu_id where menu.deleted = '0' ) a
